content: जनन {%<ab>a.</ab>%} [जन् भावे ल्युट्] Producing, causing &c.; भुजगानां जननीं जजाप विद्यां <ls>Śi. 20. 41.</ls> --नः The Supreme Being. --नं {@--1@} Birth, being born; यावज्जननं तावन्मरणं <ls>Moha M. 13.</ls> {@--2@} Causing, production, creation; शोभाजननात् <ls>Ku. 1. 42.</ls> {@--3@} Appearance, manifestation, rise. {@--4@} Life, existence; यदैव पूर्वे जनने शरीरं सा दक्षरोषात्सुदती ससर्ज <ls>Ku. 1. 53</ls>; <ls>Ś. 5. 2.</ls> {@--5@} Race, family, lineage. {@--6@} Preparation for a religious ceremony (दीक्षा).
